entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
